Text:
Thank you for the wonderful torrent FaMoUz!
Great scientific film works, and a real pleasure to watch : )

It's like hearing a God talking about the universe and everything in it ... if there actually was a God ;)
Or ... IS IT?
Nope, there's only Freeman and this great series ^^

Thank you so much for uploading! Amazing series!

I only found the subtitles of episode 4 to be missing but nothing a quick Google search can't fix =)

Great Upload!!
I'll be seeding for some weeks.
